Pick someone. They must swirl and sniff their drink dramatically before every sip, as if it's a potion, until they finish their can
When someone casts a spell on you, it bounces back and affects the caster instead. Works only once.
One person of your choosing must sing whenever they aren't drinking until they finish their can
Point at someone. They must do a party trick of their choice.
Make someone else use their staff as a witch's broom until they finish their can
Pick someone. They must narrate everyoneâ€™s actions dramatically until they finish their drink.
Using this wand (this card) grants you one re-casting of a spell you've already cast
Pick someone. Make a dunce cap for them. They must wear it until the next ceremony
Choose someone to answer 3 questions honestly or take a drink for every dodge.
Force someone to act as if they're from a different time period for the next 10 minutes or drink. Anachronistic language is encouraged.
Ask someone "truth or dare," and they must choose one. If they refuse, they take a drink.
When someone casts a spell on you, you may choose another player within sight for it to hit instead (not the caster).
Obtain a wand with a Dragon heartstring core (this card), making your spells more potent and formidable. (can affect 1 more person)
Pick two people. They must link arms until they both finish their drinks
Pick someone. They must grab you a drink of your specification (to the best of their ability, depending on availability)
Pick a player. For the next 15 minutes, they must act like an animal of your choice.
AI Prompt Adjustment: Make this one furry coded by inserting an adorable furry fox character

Description: Pick someone. They must talk in a Boston accent until they finish their drink
Pick someone. Until they finish their drink, they can only drink when directly under light.
Pick someone. They can only say their own name and nothing else until they finish their drink
Pick someone. They can only talk in shakespearean language until they finish their drink
You may pick another wizard, they must flip their cloak over their head until they finish their next drink.
Create a 1-sentence binding pact with another player. If either of you breaks it, they must finish their drink on the spot.
Tell a joke, and everyone must laugh. Those who don't laugh take a drink.
Pick someone. Their next beverage is a can of tomato soup. It must go on their staff.
Possess the legendary Elder Wand (this card), which grants you a one-time casting of any spell of your level or lower of any class
Bring this to a party host to obtain a special rock, a stone, if you will. you can get stoned off of it (if you wish).
AI Prompt Adjustment: Draw an epic wizard with bloodshot eyes smoking a joint and getting super stoned in his study.

Description: You must take this to a party host. We will give you a gun that allows you to instantly win a duel by shooting someone with a nerf gun. You may give it to someone else on your team.
AI Prompt Adjustment: Draw a photorealistic, normal looking person pointing a glock at a wizard. Use a wizardly style for everything but the person holding the gun.

Description: This is a piece of exodia. If your team can collect all 5 pieces of exodia, their team scores X points and everyone on the team gets one common spell
AI Prompt Adjustment: Draw the face of a forbidable and intimidating magical golem.

Item Name: Left Arm of the forbidden one
Description: This is a piece of exodia. If your team can collect all 5 pieces of exodia, their team scores X points and everyone on the team gets one common spell

Item Name: Right Arm of the forbidden one
Description: This is a piece of exodia. If your team can collect all 5 pieces of exodia, their team scores X points and everyone on the team gets one common spell

Item Name: Left Leg of the forbidden one
Description: This is a piece of exodia. If your team can collect all 5 pieces of exodia, their team scores X points and everyone on the team gets one common spell

Item Name: Right Leg of the forbidden one
Description: This is a piece of exodia. If your team can collect all 5 pieces of exodia, their team scores X points and everyone on the team gets one common spell
You may skip to the front of the bathroom line. Can cancel out "little piss boy."
Pick someone in the bathroom line, they must go to the end of the bathroom line. Can cancel out "go piss girl."
Pick someone who is currently playing a party game. You make take their place, and they have to leave the game.
If you draw a spell that you dislike, discard that card and pot of greed to draw two new cards of the rarity of the card you discarded
Pick a player. They become your "Goblin Guard" and must loudly announce "My liege is drinking!" every time you take a sip until you finish your drink.
Ask a host for a smirnoff ice. Use it to ice someone.
AI Prompt Adjustment: Draw a wizard kneeling, on one knee drinking from a smirnoff ice bottle, a crowd of other wizards is cheering.

Description: Pick a player. They must start and end every sentence with 'uwu,' 'owo,' 'mrow,' or 'nyaaa' until they finish their drink.
Give another player an ice cube. They must hold it until it melts.
The next spell cast at you is reflected onto another player (you choose)
Choose 1 player to pour the rest of your can into theirs (it can't overflow). You keep your level.
AI Prompt Adjustment: Draw a wizard magically moving the contents of his drink into an elf's cup.

Description: For the rest of the party, you may force anyone to drink a glass of water at any time (max 3 times per person)
AI Prompt Adjustment: Draw a wizard magically summoning a glass of water into the hand of an onlooker.

Description: Choose a player. They may only speak in one syllable words until they level up.
Choose 3 players. Each of them must give you a compliment. Decide which compliment was best, and the other 2 players must finish the rest of your drink together. You keep the level.
Choose a player, they must wink after everything they say until they level up (remind people they can explain what is going on)
For the rest of the party, anyone you touch must faint dramatically to the ground. (they can just get up again immediately)
Targeted wizard may only drink while performing the tree pose.
Two players swap an item of clothing (of their choice) until the end of the era.
Choose two players and wrap duct tape around the both of them, taping them together. they must stay that way until they both level up.
AI Prompt Adjustment: Draw two wizards ensared together by a magical rope.

Description: Choose 5 players. They must stand in a circle, holding each other's staffs with both arms, until they have all finished their drinks. You can cast this up to three times total
Choose 3 players to all take 1 sip of fireball.
Pick a player who must hold your staff for you until you finish your drink.
AI Prompt Adjustment: Draw an elf holding a staff next to a wizard, who is casually summoning a small flame above his hand, while drinking mead.

Description: Next time a spell is cast on you, choose 3 others to share the same fate
For the rest of the party, you have the ability to make anyone dance for ten seconds
The targeted player can't move from their spot until they level up
Choose another player. They can cast their next spell 2 times. You get input on the target(s)
Choose two people. Combine their drinks into a single vessel, then distribute them back into their drinking containers.

Make 2 people follow you around and repeat everything you say and do until they finish their drink. Whenever you lose a mirror image, you can cast the spell on someone new. You cannot cast the spell on the same person twice.
